title: ENVE’s Grodeo Custom bike Round-Up & Ride Brings Cycling’s Best to the Wasatch
content:
Last weekend, Ogden, Utah welcomed cyclists from around the globe for ENVE Composite’s annual Grodeo Round-Up and Ride. 2021 marks the third year for the carbon fiber titan’s Builder Summit and gravel ride. The two-day event brings renowned custom builders and dedicated cyclists together to celebrate two-wheeled, human-powered adventure. As ENVE states simply, the Grodeo […]

The post ENVE’s Grodeo Custom bike Round-Up & Ride Brings Cycling’s Best to the Wasatch appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jilli Cluff
